price: 29. Allaah wuxuu soo qaataa tusaale: addoon ay wadaagaan niman badan oo is khilaaafsan, iyo addoon kale oo gebigiba uu wada leeyahay hal nin. Miyey labadaasu isku mid yihiin xaal ahaan? Ammaan oo dhan iyo mahad waxaa leh Allaah,  badankooduse ma oga.
arabic: ضَرَبَ ٱللَّهُ مَثَلٗا رَّجُلٗا فِيهِ شُرَكَآءُ مُتَشَٰكِسُونَ وَرَجُلٗا سَلَمٗا لِّرَجُلٍ هَلۡ يَسۡتَوِيَانِ مَثَلًاۚ ٱلۡحَمۡدُ لِلَّهِۚ بَلۡ أَكۡثَرُهُمۡ لَا يَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: ḍaraba al-lahu mathalan rajulan fīhi shurakāu mutashākisūna warajulan salaman lirajulin hal yastawiyāni mathalan al-ḥamdu lillahi bal aktharuhum lā yaʿlamūna
